panels.description: Number of leaked GCP Compute Engine Instances

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(i.name) AS total
FROM gcp_instance AS i
LEFT JOIN g_machine AS m ON i.name = m.name
WHERE i.status = 'RUNNING' AND m.name IS NULL AND project_id IN ($gcp_project);

panels.title: Number of Leaked Instances

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gcp_unknown_instance_image
WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

SELECT
        i.name,
        i.instance_id,
        i.project_id,
        i.region,
        i.zone,
        i.status,
        i.gke_cluster_name,
        i.gke_pool_name
FROM gcp_instance AS i
LEFT JOIN g_machine AS m ON i.name = m.name
WHERE i.status = 'RUNNING' AND m.name IS NULL AND project_id IN ($gcp_project);

panels.description: List of GCP machine images not specified in a GCP Cloud Profile.
panels.title: Instances with Unknown Images

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gcp_orphan_disk
WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

SELECT SUM(size_gb)
FROM gcp_orphan_disk
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)

SELECT * FROM gcp_orphan_disk
WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

SELECT  count(*) FROM gcp_orphan_bucket AS gob
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

panels.description: Number of leaked GCP Networks / VPCs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(v.name) AS total
FROM gcp_vpc AS v
LEFT JOIN g_shoot AS s ON v.name = s.technical_id
WHERE s.technical_id is NULL AND project_id IN ($gcp_project);

panels.title: Number of Leaked VPCs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(name) FROM gcp_orphan_subnet
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project);

SELECT
        v.name,
        v.project_id,
        v.vpc_id,
        v.description
FROM gcp_vpc AS v
LEFT JOIN g_shoot AS s ON v.name = s.technical_id
WHERE s.technical_id is NULL AND project_id IN ($gcp_project);
SELECT * FROM gcp_orphan_subnet WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

SELECT COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_target_pool_without_frontend 
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)

panels.description: Load Balancer Target Pools which point to no longer existing GCE Virtual Machines

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_orphan_target_pool 
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)

panels.title: Target Pools with Non-Existing VMs

panels.description: LB Public IP addresses which point to Target Pools with no longer existing instance members

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(id)
FROM gcp_orphan_public_address
WHERE project_id IN ($gcp_project)

panels.title: Number of Leaked Public IPs

panels.description: List of LBs which do not have a frontend (forwarding rule)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  id,
  name,
  project_id,
  region
FROM gcp_target_pool_without_frontend WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

panels.title: Load Balancers without Frontend

panels.description: List of Target Pools which point to no longer existing GCE Instance (VM)

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM gcp_orphan_target_pool WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

panels.title: Target Pools with missing GCE Instances

panels.description: List of Forwarding Rules (LB Frontend) which point to Target Pools with no longer existing GCE Instances

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM gcp_orphan_public_address WHERE project_id in ($gcp_project);

panels.title: Forwarding Rules with Public IPs
